articles.title: 2025 NFL combine: Key prospects to watch in Indianapolis this week; biggest snubs still likely to get drafted - CBS Sports
articles.description: Players who could boost their stock in Indy, and others who surprisingly didn't earn invites
articles.content: It's hard to believe that we're less than two months out from the 2025 NFL Draft, and while my Big Board is still written in pencil, a week in Indianapolis at the NFL combine will be an opportunity f… [+11203 chars]
